metadata.title: Microfaunal Analysis of Late Quaternary Deposits of the Northern Bering Sea

creators.name: Kristin McDougall: U. S. Geological Survey (USGS), Menlo Park, California 94025, U.S.A.

metadata.description: To determine what biofacies, if any, could be recognized in the shallow marine waters of Norton Sound, what physical parameters might be related to any of the biofacies found, and which of these biofacies relations might be useful in interpreting the paleoecology of the Holocene transgression.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To determine what biofacies, if any, could be recognized in the shallow marine waters of Norton Sound, what physical parameters might be related to any of the biofacies found, and which of these biofacies relations might be useful in interpreting the paleoecology of the Holocene transgression.
